titleStmt.title: Solomons choice: or, A president for kings and princes, and all that are in authority, presented in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons at Margarets Westminster, at their publique fast, Septemb. 25. 1644. By Lazarus Seaman, pastor of the Church of Christ at Alhallowes-Breadstreet-London. One of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Seaman, Lazarus, d. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for J. Rothwell, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Sun, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the last monethly fast before the honourable house of Commons, Sept. 25. 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Sun, in Pauls Church-yard
